item.title: Example 2
item.description:
Basic

Neque porro quisquam est, qui dolorem ipsum, quia dolor sit, amet, consectetur, adipisci velit.

  • lorem
  • ipsum
  1. dolor
  2. sit

Blockquote

They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety, deserve neither liberty nor safety.

Benjamin Franklin

Code

c static void asyncEnabled(Dict* args, void* vAdmin, String* txid, struct Allocator* requestAlloc) { struct Admin* admin = Identity_check((struct Admin*) vAdmin); int64_t enabled = admin->asyncEnabled; Dict d = Dict_CONST(String_CONST("asyncEnabled"), Int_OBJ(enabled), NULL); Admin_sendMessage(&d, txid, admin); }
